About Me

👋 Hi, I'm Pranay

I am a Power Platform Developer with expertise in Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Dataverse. I specialize in building scalable business solutions that improve operational efficiency.

I am PL-400 certified and actively contribute to the Power Platform community by sharing technical insights, best practices, and project case studies.

🏆 Certifications

  • Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Developer Associate (PL-400)
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
  • Microsoft Applied Skills:
    • Create and manage automated processes with Power Automate
    • Create and manage canvas apps with Power Apps
    • Create and manage model-driven apps with Power Apps and Dataverse
  • Responsive Web Design – freeCodeCamp

📝 Why This Blog?

This blog is my way of:

  • Documenting my learning journey
  • Sharing technical insights
  • Showcasing my projects and expertise

I’m currently participating in the Powerful Devs Challenge and posting quick 5-minute reads on every module I complete. Follow along as I progress through 93 modules, gaining deeper insights into Power Platform development.

🚀 What I’m Working On

  • Powerful Devs Challenge: Completing 93 Power Platform modules before March 28, 2025.
  • Innovative Power Platform Projects: Exploring Dataverse, PCF Components, AI Builder, and Virtual Agents.
  • Blog Expansion: Writing case studies, technical deep dives, and tutorials for Power Platform developers and recruiters.
